targets.rawSql:
select current_date as "time", store, item, value, region.description as "region", geojson."data" as "geojson"
from (
	select store.name as store, item.item_name as item, store.id as store_id, item.id as item_id, store.name_id as name_id, avg(a.value) AS value
	from aggregator a
	join store on a.storeid = store.id and store.disabled = false
	join item on a.itemid = item.id
	join item_store_join isj on a.storeid = isj.store_id and a.itemid = isj.item_id and isj.inactive = false
	where a.dataelement = 'mos' and item.ven_category in ([[ven]])
	group by 1,2,3,4,5	
) as a
	join "name" as n on name_id=n.id
	join name_category1_level1 as region on n.category1_id = region.id
	join geojson on region.id = geojson.id
where item = [[item]] and store in ([[store]])
order by region.description;
